about_the_game:
Animocity is a hardcore top-down shooter game where we follow a bunch of magical animals down an ever changing set of dungeons as they use spells to fight their way out.

Prologue:
Deep in the enchanted valley of Argynost, among the dense forests, the serene lakes, and the silent hills, away from the world of men, magical beasts lived in harmony and peace, in societies of their own making, enjoying the gifts of Nature.
But the forces of darkness showed its face as the skies turned dark one night and evil, heinous demons crawled out of the earth, feasting upon the world.
The magical beasts were forced to run, away from their homes, into the isolated mountains. There was no other way, but to go through the caves…

Key Features:
Randomly generated dungeons, items, enemies and bosses
Hardcore top down shooter action
Gorgeous stylized characters and environments.
Lots of loot and weapons to be found
Different types of enemies

Please note that Animocity is still in development - the Early Access release is planned for May 2021
